inclusion.criterion: No contraindications to vaccination as specified in the Green Book - Immunisation Against Infectious Disease, HMSO.
inclusion.label: met

notes: The patient has been previously vaccinated with meningococcal group ACWY conjugate vaccine and meningococcal group B vaccine. The genetic survey revealed ADAMTS13 >10%. He was treated with plasma exchange and corticosteroids for atypical hemolytic uremic syndrome.
